messages.title: MAKING BREXIT A SUCCESS IS CENTRAL TO OUR NATIONAL INTEREST
messages.content: As a nation, we face the most important period in our lifetime. Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest – and it is central to your own security and prosperity.

messages.title: THIS IS A UNIQUE AND CRUCIAL ELECTION FOR OUR COUNTRY
messages.content: By going to Brussels with a strong negotiating hand I can ensure we guarantee our economic security.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Strong negotiation in Brussels to ensure economic security, guaranteeing security and well-paid jobs, where every child gets a great place to live.

mentions.tacticalSituation: A choice between Prime Minister Theresa May or Jeremy Corbyn for negotiating Brexit.

issues.brexitEurope: Making Brexit a success is central to national interest, affecting security and prosperity. Seeking the right deal via strong negotiation ensures economic security.
issues.economy: Guaranteeing economic security through Brexit negotiations.
issues.governance: A choice between strong and stable leadership with Theresa May, or a hung parliament and coalition of chaos with Jeremy Corbyn.

quotes.text: Labour under Jeremy Corbyn are a shambles and he would embarrass Britain in Brussels and risk our economic security.

images.caption: Theresa May and Gordon Henderson — Strong and stable leadership for Sittingbourne and Sheppey. A coalition of chaos with Jeremy Corbyn OR.
